title: India Blockchain Week brings Together the Brightest Minds in Web3
description: Bangalore, November XX, 2023 — India Blockchain Week (IBW), the country’s flagship series of blockchain and Web3 events held in Bangalore from Dec.4-10, is delighted to announce that the attendees are going to have unparalleled opportunities for networking, collaboration, and discussion at the weeklong festival. title: The first no-gas Ordinals marketplace goes live on Internet Computer (ICP)
description: Since the invention of Bitcoin, the DeFi market, its investors, and developers have taken steps to grow the industry through new inventions. One such invention has been the BTC Ordinals, now supported by the Bioniq Ordinals marketplace. The Bioniq Ordinals marketplace has officially gone live on the Internet Computer, ushering in a new era of ... Read more

title: IMAGINE2050: Bridging borders for a global future
description: In a world that often seems divided by language, nationality, and culture, there exists a visionary organization that seeks to unite children from all corners of the globe. IMAGINE2050 is not just an organization; it’s a movement that aims to transcend boundaries and connect young minds in a shared dream for the future. This article ... Read more

title: AI in Warfare: A New Era of Military Intelligence and Ethical Challenges
description: Artificial intelligence (AI) has emerged as a pivotal asset in an era where technological advancements redefine warfare boundaries. The Israeli Defense Force (IDF) recently showcased its AI-powered targeting management system, “The Gospels,” marking a significant development in military strategies.
